A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat (Ginga) stopping anyone going near the family. He also uses fear, has dark powers that he uses, and ultimately puts one and all in danger.
What starts off with some deliciously creepy scenes is acted well, but the film itself is a mess, with the ending leaving everything a mess after all
